20110110140752.000|20110110140754.000|CC1|GROW FOR THOSE WHO SURVIVED, BUT
20110110140754.000|20110110140755.000|CC1|ALSO FOR THOSE SIX WHO DID NOT  
20110110140755.000|20110110140756.000|CC1|MAKE IT.

20110110140837.000|20110110140838.000|CC1|YOUNGEST VICTIM.

20110110140900.000|20110110140901.000|CC1|MORNING.
